channel.title: Recent Executive Orders
channel.description: Latest Executive Orders from the White House

item.title: Saving TikTok While Protecting National Security
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1.

item.title: Designating Antifa as a Domestic Terrorist Organization
item.description: Section 1. Antifa as a Terrorist Threat. Antifa is a militarist, anarchist enterprise that explicitly calls for the overthrow of the United States

item.title: The Gold Card
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1. Purpose.

item.title: Establishing An Emergency Board to Investigate Disputes Between the Long Island Rail Road Company and Certain of its Employees Represented by Certain Labor Organizations

item.title: Further Extending the TikTok Enforcement Delay
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1. Extension.

item.title: Restoring the United States Department of War
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1. Purpose.

item.title: Modifying The Scope of Reciprocal Tariffs and Establishing Procedures for Implementing Trade and Security Agreements

item.title: Strengthening Efforts to Protect U.S. Nationals from Wrongful Detention Abroad

item.title: Implementing The United States–Japan Agreement

item.title: Making Federal Architecture Beautiful Again
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1. Purpose.
